Name: 8i - Make VR Human
About the game: 8i brings virtual experiences to life with the highest fidelity, most realistic volumetric video of humans. A truly immersive experience, volumetric VR gives you a sense of presence and freedom to move through space and time, opening up worlds of possibilities. 8i volumetric VR experience features: True presence: Step into the story and feel like you’re not just watching someone, you’re with them. Freedom of movement: Walk completely around the person you’re watching as if you’re in the same room, and choose your own perspective. Experience it anywhere: View on virtual reality headset, mobile and on the web
Meta Title: 8i - Make VR Human: Apr 25, 2016, 8i and Full Overview
